/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The street is flanked by buildings and trees, creating a vibrant urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, adding to the overall brightness of the scene. The sun is shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and the expanse of the sky. The colors in the image are vivid and bright, reflecting the lively atmosphere of the city.
